definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: The mechanism of electroless nickel deposition in sodium hypophosphite bath is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了次亞磷酸鈉體系化學鍍鎳沉積機理。

sentences.english: All four preferred electroless baths use hypophosphite as a reducing agent.
sentences.chinese: 所有四個優先使用化學浴次磷酸鈉作爲還原劑。

sentences.english: METHODS Determinating the contents of riboflavin sodium phosphate by UV-vis.
sentences.chinese: 方法用分光光度法測定核黃素磷酸鈉的含量。

sentences.english: The technological process for preparing phosphorous acid from the production waste of sodium hypophosphite was described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了從次磷酸鈉生產廢渣中回收提取亞磷酸的工藝。

sentences.english: Sodium tripolyphosphate (STPP) is a highly efficient retardant, and is commonly used in building gypsum.
sentences.chinese: 三聚磷酸鈉是建築石膏高效緩凝劑。

sentences.english: The fermentation of sugar to alcohol and the production of lime and sodium phosphate also generate carbon dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 糖發酵成酒精和石灰和磷酸鈉的生產也產生二氧化碳。

sentences.english: Addition of the appropriate sodium phosphate effectively improved meat texture and tas…
sentences.chinese: 添加適量的磷酸鈉能有效改善醬體中牛肉的口感。

sentences.english: Sodium magnesium fructose diphosphate conduced to maintenance the integrality of myocardial cell ultrastructures.
sentences.chinese: 表明果糖二磷酸鈉鎂能維護細胞結構的完整性。

sentences.english: Rather it's composite chicken made with ground-up chicken skin held together with sodium phosphate and salt .
sentences.chinese: 而是綜合了雞與地面跟進雞皮膚一起舉行磷酸鈉和鹽。

sentences.english: The impurities removing in production of sodium hypophosphite is focused in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 重點論述了次磷酸鈉工業生產中的雜質去除問題。
